description: This file serves as the main entry point for a Flutter mobile application focused on healthcare management. It initializes necessary widgets, sets up theming, routing, and navigation, and defines the root scaffold with responsive layout adaptation.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget that provides theme, navigation, and startup configuration for the app.

classes.name: RootScaffold
classes.description: The primary scaffold that manages layout, navigation rail, bottom navigation bar, and displays main pages.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes Flutter binding and launches the app.

methods.name: getEnv
methods.description: Asynchronously loads and retrieves environment variables from a .env file on demand.
